title: versions of Bodoni and Bulmer
content:
Can anyone give a definitive ID for these versions of Bodoni and Bulmer.

The version of Bodoni is quite nice, though i can’t find a match, particularly in regards to the negative space in the ’J’

The Bulmer looks like a display version, but the terminals are more refined than i can find

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Didion2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152159/http:/typophile.com/files/Didion2.jpg) | 31.37 KB |
| [burroughs\_dry 2003.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152159/http:/typophile.com/files/burroughs_dry%202003.jpg) | 143.04 KB |
author: sinoran_knight

comments.content: I think the Bodoni is a Didot, probably [the one from H&FJ](http://web.archive.org/web/20091125152159/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100004).

ah great , i think it is didot 96, thanks.

anyone know about the bulmer on the burroughs image?
